itunes:title: Garden Talk
title: Garden Talk
description:
Come talk shop with us as we share the victories and losses of the growing season thus far, explore working with what structure and style you and your space already have, "yart" in the garden, and share our personal favorites flowers if we had to choose.

What's We're Sipping
www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
The “What We’re Sipping” segment today is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is a wine supplier that pairs organic, biodynamic, low-sugar, low-alcohol wines from all over the world with customers that share their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines. We love them because their wine is delicious, unfussy, and oh-so-good.
content:encoded:
Come talk shop with us as we share the victories and losses of the growing season thus far, explore working with what structure and style you and your space already have, "yart" in the garden, and share our personal favorites flowers if we had to choose.

itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott
